original_title: For peace: on the imperialist war in Ukraine
overview: For peace: on the imperialist war in Ukraine is a documentary about the material roots of the war in Ukraine in imperialist competition, the political and economic character of the Russian Federation, the rise of fascist forces in Ukraine, the continued escalation of the global capitalist crisis and the potential for war to spiral into global conflagration.
title: For peace: on the imperialist war in Ukraine
